short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Image Search Lens, the smartest tool to quickly search, bulk download, and view details of any image while browsing any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover a new way to explore images online with AI Image Search Lens, the ultimate tool designed to revolutionize your visual search experience. Whether you're a researcher, designer, content creator, or just someone who loves diving deep into the world of images, this extension is tailored to meet your every need. With cutting-edge AI algorithms at its core, AI Image Search Lens not only lets you search for images directly from any webpage but also enables bulk downloads and provides detailed insights with ease.

What sets AI Image Search Lens apart? It's the seamless integration of AI that takes your image search experience to the next level. Instantly analyze images, recognize patterns, and get highly accurate search results with just one click. Whether you're hunting for visually similar images, high-resolution versions, or the original source, AI Image Search Lens delivers the information you need in seconds.

Why You Need AI Image Search Lens:

•	AI-Powered Image Search: Forget the hassle of endless searching. With AI Image Search Lens, one click is all it takes to find similar images, related content, and more. Discover new visuals or trace an image back to its roots effortlessly.
•	Bulk Image Download: Save time and streamline your workflow. Select multiple images from any webpage and download them all at once. Perfect for curating collections or gathering resources for your next big project.
•	In-Depth Image Information: Go beyond just looking at images—get to know them. Access detailed metadata, source information, and other crucial details with a simple right-click. Ideal for verifying authenticity or sourcing accurate information.
•	High-Resolution Image Access: Need a clearer picture? AI Image Search Lens helps you find the best quality versions of any image, ensuring your visuals are always crisp and professional, whether for design, print, or digital use.
•	User-Friendly Interface: Simplicity meets functionality. The extension is designed to blend seamlessly into your Chrome browser, making it easy to navigate and use, even for those who aren't tech experts.
•	Customizable Settings: Tailor AI Image Search Lens to your unique needs. Adjust the number of search results, choose your preferred image formats, and optimize your browsing experience like never before.

Don't miss out on the future of image search. Download AI Image Search Lens today and take control of your visual content like never before!

Version 1.2
-Fixed a bug with sites with a lot of images.
-Fixed a bug where some image extensions where not saved with its extension name when using bulk download.
-Fixed a bug where the whole site is a SVG image.
-Fixed SVG images not visible on single image tab.
-Fixed a bug when incompatible web images used against image search, adding a block and a warning for those
